#include<stdio.h>
int main() {
    long int m, n;
    int carry, total, t, r, s;
    while(scanf("%ld %ld", &m, &n)) {
       if(!m && !n) break;
       total=carry=0;
       while(m || n) {
          r=m%10, s=n%10;
          if(r+s+carry>=10) {
             total++;
             carry=(r+s+carry)/10;
          }
          else carry=0;
          n/=10;
          m/=10;
       }
       if(!total) printf("No carry operation.\n");
       else if(total==1) printf("1 carry operation.\n");
       else printf("%d carry operations.\n",total);
    }
    return 0;
}
